name: Burning Metal
description:
3D combat car refit and multiplayer online competition game. Featuring straightforward gameplay, stunning graphics and breathtaking battle scenes, the game provides intense combat car battles that immerses you in a world of speed, pursuit, collision, and firepower.

The game gives players the chance to experience true speed and multiple well-designed combat cars, A variety of map styles. Up to 10 players can compete simultaneously, with leagues consisting of multiple players!

•Players from around the world in a single server. Compete with gamers from different countries and regions.
•Up to 10 players can do battle simultaneously. Various arcade modes available.
•Simple gameplay offer an exciting gaming experience as well as the ability to hone your combat skills.
•5 classes, various combat cars, and unique skills, forming the most powerful strategies.
•Create your league, fight in ranked matches, earn worldwide glory.
•Various epic battlegrounds, including a mysterious factory and isolated desert.
•Stunning special effects, flying missiles amidst flying cannonballs bring you a taste of genuine warfare.

We are dedicated to bringing you the best possible gaming experience!
